title: stix1x-incident-extension-schema
description: This is the wrapper for the indicator extension is used by the stix-elevator

likely_impact.description: Specifies the likely potential impact within the relevant context if this Indicator were to occur. This is typically local to an Indicator consumer and not typically shared. This field includes a Description of the likely potential impact within the relevant context if this Indicator were to occur and a Confidence held in the accuracy of this assertion. If the extension-definition is being used, then it is required

description.description: This property contains a prose description of the likely impact.

confidence.description: See confidence common property definition in section 3.2 of the STIX 2.1 specification.

value.description: This property contains the rationale for an original classification determination.
